name: 50 Games Bundle - Unity Source Code
description:
This bundle contains 50 complete Unity games.

All these games are compatible for android, iOS, WebGL, PC and many other platforms.

All combined these projects are worth $854.73, so this bundle will save you $635.73.

If you want to test these games on your browser or android device please go to my profile and you will find test links on each project description.

These projects are included in the bundle:

1. Boom Ballz


2. Brick Breaker


3. Color Blocks


4. Color Cube


5. Flippy Platforms


6. Mission to Mars


7. Neon Space Fighter
